additional_info:
Jacuzzi, Storeroom, Intercom, Telephone, Cable-TV, Security, Generator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 Fabulous new apartment with gorgeous views of Vake Park, the Turtle Lake forest and the entire city. In semi-finished condition with all amenities, fully independent power, heating, and water supply. 5 minutes walk from downtown Vake, 15 minutes walk from Turtle Lake! Very quiet, very clean air, beautiful sunlit rooms. Spacious apartment, large windows, high ceilings, with concierge, garden, gardener, elevator, marble fireplace. Bathrooms, flooring, and finishing touches to be installed at short notice according to owners wishes. Absolutely fabulous brand new property.
Apartment #2
